title: "PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working" error when I try to launch program (worked before)
body:
I have been playing this game for about a week with no hiccups of any sort.  But yesterday evening I went to play (I had played a game in the morning) windows had a popup that said "PVP.net patcher kernel has stopped working" .  I thought it might have been my desktop link that was bad but when I went to the games files and clicked on the .exe the same thing happened.  I had looked up the error and found only help from 4+ years ago and it didn't work.  I found a way to start the program by launching the patcher application but I'm not sure why the patcher launches the game and not the intended .exe file.

*I run a windows 8 laptop

replies.body: This kernel errors is usually due to a settings with your OS or something else that's blocking the patcher from launching or scanning game files.  Go over the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to configure your PC to allow this access.  That should get you squared away!
